import React from 'react' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import { ActiveLink, ImageWrapper, SectionDesc, SectionTitle, SeeMoreLink } from '../../SectionsComponents' /* STYLES */ import '~/Styles/Sections/Home/about.scss' import { useDeviceDetect } from '../../../Helpers' /* IMAGES */ const Statue = '/Assets/Images/statue-about.png' export const HomeAbout = ({ animation }) => { const { desktop } = useDeviceDetect() return (
